body: Generation Y blogs about the upsurge in sales of pirated DVDs and music, commenting: "Absent from the public catalogs are the documentaries — so often watched in Cuban homes — that approach our national history through a different lens from the official."
original_body: Generation Y blogs about the upsurge in sales of pirated DVDs and music, commenting: "Absent from the public catalogs are the documentaries — so often watched in Cuban homes — that approach our national history through a different lens from the official."
title: Cuba: Forbidden Programs
